document.title: Solar System (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “Solar System”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solar_System on 20 Aug 2015.
document.body: The Solar System is the Sun and all the objects in orbit around it. The Sun is orbited by planets, asteroids, comets and other things. Six of the planets and three of the dwarf planets are orbited by moons. Furthermore, planetary dust orbits the gas giants. [“Solar System”]
